name: Incredible Magic
description:
Based on the wizarding world of Harry Potter and created for the Arcane Assembly jam #ArcaneAssembly.  Dumbledor will teach you a series of spells to cast some incredible magic to read minds!  This is based off of a real magic trick!  I am not affiliated with WB or Rawling or anything like that.

Check out my Unity Asset store tools here!

Zerk's Unity Tools
